MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Greenbank Court and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:03pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further repairs required by a third party on the lift before we can continue working   we now hope to have your power restored as quickly and as safely as possible by 2am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:23pm on 8th January 2021.
